other_gear: masterwork studded leather, masterwork rapier, magnifying glass, merchant's scale, silver holy symbol, 638 gp

sections.body: During Combat The commoner calls for help, and uses alchemical items to delay attackers.
sections.name: Tactics

sections.body: A shopkeeper stocks a mix of useful supplies and gear for townsfolk and adventurers alike. The stat block above can be used for any typical merchant in a cosmopolitan settlement.

name: Shopkeeper
skills: Appraise +11, Bluff +5, Intimidate +5, Knowledge (history, local) +4, Perception +11, Sense Motive +9, Spellcraft +5 (+7 to identify magic item properties)
combat_gear: potion of cure light wounds, acid (2), alchemist's fire (2), tanglefoot bag, thunderstone
